Class SpeakerIdentApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpeakerIdentApp

  • public class SpeakerIdentApp
extends java.lang.Object

    Identifies a speaker independently of text, based on the MARF framework, http://marf.sf.net.

    $Id: SpeakerIdentApp.java,v 1.70 2009/03/03 12:06:54 mokhov Exp $
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Version:
    0.3.0, $Revision: 1.70 $
    Author:
    Serguei Mokhov, Stephen Sinclair, Ian Clement, Dimitrios Nicolacopoulos, The MARF Research and Development Group

      Identifies a speaker using MARF given configuration, wave filename, and possibly expected speaker ID.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
      Main body.
      static void setCustomConfig()
      Customizes MARF's configuration based on the options.
      static void setDefaultConfig()
      Sets default MARF configuration parameters as normalization for preprocessing, FFT for feature extraction, Euclidean distance for training and classification with no spectrogram dumps and no debug information, assuming WAVE file format.
      static void train(java.lang.String pstrFilename)
      Updates training set with a new sample from a given file.
      private static void usage()
      Displays application's usage information and exits.
      static void validateVersions()
      Makes sure the applications isn't run against older MARF version.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static final void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
        Main body.
        Parameters:
        argv - command-line arguments

      • ident

        public static final void ident(java.lang.String pstrConfig,
         java.lang.String pstrFilename,
         int piExpectedID)
                        throws marf.util.MARFException
        Identifies a speaker using MARF given configuration, wave filename, and possibly expected speaker ID.
        Parameters:
        pstrConfig - configuration string for stats
        pstrFilename - name of the wave file with voice sample to identify
        piExpectedID - expected speaker ID; if -1 then no stats is kept
        Throws:
        marf.util.MARFException - in case of any error while processing is in MARF
        Since:
        0.3.0.5

      • train

        public static final void train(java.lang.String pstrFilename)
                        throws marf.util.MARFException
        Updates training set with a new sample from a given file.
        Parameters:
        pstrFilename - name of the wave file with voice sample train the system on
        Throws:
        marf.util.MARFException - in case of any error while processing is in MARF
        Since:
        0.3.0.5

      • usage

        private static final void usage()
        Displays application's usage information and exits.

      • getVersion

        public static final java.lang.String getVersion()
        Retrieves String representation of the application's version.
        Returns:
        version String

      • getIntVersion

        public static final int getIntVersion()
        Retrieves integer representation of the application's version.
        Returns:
        integer version

      • validateVersions

        public static final void validateVersions()
        Makes sure the applications isn't run against older MARF version. Exits with 1 if the MARF version is too old.

      • getConfigString

        public static final java.lang.String getConfigString(java.lang.String[] pstrArgv)
        Composes the current configuration of in a string form.
        Parameters:
        pstrArgv - set of configuration options passed through the command line; can be null or empty. If latter is the case, MARF itself is queried for its numerical set up inside.
        Returns:
        the current configuration setup

      • setDefaultConfig

        public static final void setDefaultConfig()
                                   throws marf.util.MARFException
        Sets default MARF configuration parameters as normalization for preprocessing, FFT for feature extraction, Euclidean distance for training and classification with no spectrogram dumps and no debug information, assuming WAVE file format.
        Throws:
        marf.util.MARFException
        Since:
        0.3.0.5

      • setCustomConfig

        public static final void setCustomConfig()
                                  throws marf.util.MARFException
        Customizes MARF's configuration based on the options.
        Throws:
        marf.util.MARFException - if some options are out of range
        Since:
        0.3.0.5
